data.label: 小米游戏 SDK
data.description: 小米游戏是小米手机、小米平板、小米电视的官方游戏下载平台，在这里我们为所有游戏开发者提供一站式的接入服务，并提供高质量分发与推广服务，为您的游戏助跑。

data.label: Xiaomi Game SDK
data.description: Xiaomi Games is the official game download platform for Xiaomi phones, Xiaomi tablets, and Xiaomi TVs. Here we provide one-stop access services for all game developers, as well as high-quality distribution and promotion services to give your game a boost.
